alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Denton; Grayson; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:14PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wise, northern Denton, southern Cooke and southwestern Grayson Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sanger, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denton, Gainesville, Sanger, Krum, Pilot Point, Aubrey, Collinsville, Gunter, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Lake Kiowa, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Ponder, Tioga, Road Runner, Valley View, Leo, Stony, Lake Ray Roberts, Bolivar, and Ethel. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 470 and 494. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
